alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 2:12PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Elko County through 245 PM PDT... At 212 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Wells. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Moor Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County
